trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> 웹 서버 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤은 Delete, Insert, Select 및 Update 데이터베이스 작업을 수행 하기 위해 비즈니스 개체의 메서드를 호출 하는 데이터 원본을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 소스 뷰에서 디자인 뷰로 전환 하면 태그 소스 코드 설명 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>제어 구문 분석 되 고 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전이 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 소스 뷰로 다시 전환 하는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 태그 소스 코드에 유지 되 고 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그를 편집 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceDesigner 클래스에 대 한 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>비주얼 디자이너에서 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class members provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceDesigner 클래스 멤버는 다음 기능을 제공:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>속성은 데이터 소스 구성 마법사를 표시할 수 있는지 여부를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property indicates whether the schema of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can be refreshed at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>속성 표시 여부는 연관 된 스키마 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>디자인 타임에 컨트롤을 새로 고칠 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property specifies the method that performs the Select function.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>속성 선택 기능을 수행 하는 방법을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>속성, 연결 된 컨트롤에 데이터를 제공 하는 비즈니스 개체의 유형을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>메서드가 지정 된 이름의 데이터 원본 뷰를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a list of data source view names for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>메서드는 연결 된 데이터 원본 뷰 이름 목록을 반환 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>메서드 관련된 비즈니스 개체의 Select 메서드에 대 한 메타 데이터를 추출 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>메서드를 사용 하면 데이터 소스 구성 마법사는 비주얼 디자이너 화면에 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>메서드 속성에서 제거, 다른 속성을 추가 또는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성을 숨깁니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 내부적으로 생성 하는.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>연결 된 만들 때 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤 또는 시각적 디자이너 화면에서 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>메서드를 호출할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called, and the CanConfigure property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>메서드를 호출 하 고 CanConfigure 속성은 `true`경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>속성은 연결 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤 중 하나를 구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>또는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>인터페이스.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanConfigure is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: CanConfigure 이면 `true`, **데이터 소스 구성** 메뉴 항목이 표시 되는 **일반 ObjectDataSource 작업** 비주얼 디자이너 화면에 연결된 된 컨트롤의 상황에 맞는 메뉴입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스 구성 마법사는이 메뉴 항목이 선택 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>메서드를 호출할 수 있습니다. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 그렇지 않은 경우.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>메서드를 호출할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, and the CanRefreshSchema property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties both contain a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>메서드를 호출 하 고 CanRefreshSchema 속성은 `true`경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>속성은 연결 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤 중 하나를 구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>또는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>인터페이스를 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>속성 둘 다에 값을 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanRefreshSchema is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: CanRefreshSchema 이면 `true`, **스키마 새로 고침** 메뉴 항목이 표시 되는 **일반 ObjectDataSource 작업** 비주얼 디자이너 화면에 연결된 된 컨트롤의 상황에 맞는 메뉴입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>호출 되지 않으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너 화면에 데이터 소스 구성 마법사를 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Configure 메서드 비주얼 디자이너 화면에 데이터 소스 구성 마법사를 표시 하는 트랜잭션을 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 선택 하면 구성 메서드가 호출 되는 **데이터 소스 구성** 에서 메뉴 항목의 **일반 ObjectDataSource 작업** 상황에 맞는 메뉴는 연관 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: **데이터 소스 구성** 상황에 맞는 메뉴에 메뉴 항목 표시 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>속성은 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 이름 가진 데이터 원본 뷰를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetView method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 영역의 GetView 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>지정한 이름 가진 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> is used as the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `viewName` 은 `null` 또는 빈 문자열 (""), 이름에서 반환 되는 배열에서 첫 번째 뷰 이름을 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>지정 된 이름으로 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view names are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, GetView generates an unnamed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>명명 되지 않은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> 을 생성 하는 영역의 GetView</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> 뷰 이름이 없으면 반환 되는 경우

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 포함 하는 문자열은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An with the name specified by viewName.
trans-unit.target: 로 지정 된 이름의 viewName 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 데이터 원본 뷰 이름 목록을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 여기서 메서드 연결된 된 컨트롤의 스키마 데이터 테이블의 이름에서 뷰 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> objects of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> 관련 된 개체 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 속성을 제거 또는 디스플레이 추가 속성을 추가 하는 디자이너에서 사용 된 **속성** 표 또는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성을 숨기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 파생 된 메서드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>숨기려면 디자이너에서 구현 하는 해당 디자인 타임 속성을 사용 하 여 다양 한 컨트롤 속성 및 속성을 추가 하거나 속성을 제거 하는 메서드는 **속성** 눈금.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: PreFilterProperties 메서드는 디자인 타임 속성을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>연결 된 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>에 표시 되도록는 **속성** 비주얼 디자이너의 모눈.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>추가 되 고 숨겨진 속성.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 지정 된 비즈니스 개체에서 Select 메서드에 대 한 메타 데이터를 추출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property from the <xref:System.Type> object that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 로 명명 된 메서드에 대 한 메타 데이터를 추출 하는 RefreshSchema 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>속성에서는 <xref:System.Type>로 명명 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>속성에 연결 된 데이터를 제공 하는 비즈니스 개체의 형식인 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The metadata is saved in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> array and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> array of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 메타 데이터에 저장 되는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>배열 및는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A>디자이너의 배열입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 처리 하는 동안 예외가 발생 한 경우 오류 메시지를 표시 하지 않습니다; 그렇지 않으면 예외 메시지가 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> method of the associated control is called.
trans-unit.target: 실행할 때 메서드의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>연결된 된 컨트롤의 메서드가 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The SelectMethod property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: SelectMethod 속성 그림자의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectMethod property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: SelectMethod 속성의 값 변경 된 경우, 연결 된 항목에 대 한 디자인 타임 태그 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>메서드를 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>속성은 true이 고, 그렇지 않으면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> is called.
trans-unit.target: 실행할 때 메서드의 이름을 포함 하는 문자열은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 지정 된 메서드를 포함 하는 형식의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The TypeName property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: TypeName 속성 그림자의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the TypeName property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: TypeName 속성의 값 변경 된 경우, 연결 된 항목에 대 한 디자인 타임 태그 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>컨트롤을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>메서드를 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>속성은 true이 고, 그렇지 않으면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Delete를 수행 하는 메서드를 포함 하는 형식의 이름을 포함 하는 문자열, Insert, Select 및 Update 데이터베이스에 연결 된 지정 된 작업 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>합니다.
